items.title: House of Sand and Fog
items.actors: Jennifer Connelly, Ben Kingsley, Ron Eldard
items.plot: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her house's new owners.

items.title: Fatal Attraction
items.actors: Michael Douglas, Glenn Close, Anne Archer
items.plot: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

items.title: Overboard
items.actors: Goldie Hawn, Kurt Russell, Edward Herrmann
items.plot: A cruel but beautiful heiress mocks and cheats a hired carpenter. When she gets amnesia after an accident, he decides to introduce her to regular life by convincing her that they're husband and wife.

items.title: 5 to 7
items.actors: Anton Yelchin, Bérénice Marlohe, Olivia Thirlby
items.plot: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.

items.title: Devs
items.actors: Sonoya Mizuno, Nick Offerman, Jin Ha
items.plot: A computer engineer investigates the secretive development division in her company, which she believes is behind the disappearance of her boyfriend.

items.title: Another Round
items.actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang
items.plot: Four high-school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.

items.title: Falling Down
items.actors: Michael Douglas, Robert Duvall, Barbara Hershey
items.plot: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

items.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley
items.actors: Matt Damon, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law
items.plot: In late 1950s New York, a young underachiever named Tom Ripley is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

items.title: The Loft
items.actors: Karl Urban, James Marsden, Wentworth Miller
items.plot: Five married guys secretly share a penthouse loft in the city where they can carry out hidden affairs. But the fantasy becomes a nightmare, when they discover the dead body of a woman in the loft one of the group must be involved.

items.title: Annihilation
items.actors: Natalie Portman, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Tessa Thompson
items.plot: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

items.title: Why Women Kill
items.actors: Jack Davenport, Lucy Liu, Allison Tolman
items.plot: An anthology series that follows three women in different decades all living in the same house, as they deal with infidelity and betrayals in their marriages.

items.title: Upload
items.actors: Robbie Amell, Andy Allo, Allegra Edwards
items.plot: A man is able to choose his own afterlife after his untimely death, by having his consciousness uploaded into a virtual world. As he gets used to his new life and befriends his angel (real world handler), questions about his death...

items.title: Resident Alien
items.actors: Alan Tudyk, Sara Tomko, Corey Reynolds
items.plot: A crash-landed alien takes on the identity of a small-town Colorado doctor and slowly begins to wrestle with the moral dilemma of his secret mission on Earth.

items.title: Unorthodox
items.actors: Shira Haas, Amit Rahav, Jeff Wilbusch
items.plot: Story of a young ultra-Orthodox Jewish woman who flees her arranged marriage and religious community to start a new life abroad.

items.title: Blast from the Past
items.actors: Brendan Fraser, Alicia Silverstone, Christopher Walken
items.plot: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

items.title: Bad Times at the El Royale
items.actors: Jeff Bridges, Cynthia Erivo, Dakota Johnson
items.plot: Early 1970s. Four strangers check in at the El Royale Hotel. The hotel is deserted, staffed by a single desk clerk. Some of the new guests' reasons for being there are less than innocent and some are not who they appear to be.

items.title: Love, Death & Robots
items.actors: Fred Tatasciore, Scott Whyte, Nolan North
items.plot: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.

items.title: Moonlight
items.actors: Mahershala Ali, Naomie Harris, Trevante Rhodes
items.plot: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

items.title: Airplane!
items.director: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker
items.actors: Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Leslie Nielsen
items.plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

items.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
items.actors: Matthew Broderick, Alan Ruck, Mia Sara
items.plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

items.title: Leviathan
items.actors: Aleksey Serebryakov, Elena Lyadova, Roman Madyanov
items.plot: In a Russian coastal town, Kolya is forced to fight the corrupt mayor when he is told that his house will be demolished. He recruits a lawyer friend to help, but the man's arrival brings further misfortune for Kolya and his family.

items.title: The Geographer Drank His Globe Away
items.actors: Konstantin Khabenskiy, Elena Lyadova, Aleksandr Robak
items.plot: The ordinary troubles of the ordinary teacher in the ordinary class during the ordinary midlife crisis.

items.title: Room
items.actors: Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay, Sean Bridgers
items.plot: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

items.title: The Theory of Everything
items.actors: Eddie Redmayne, Felicity Jones, Tom Prior
items.plot: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

items.title: Whiplash
items.actors: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist
items.plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

items.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
items.actors: William Holden, Alec Guinness, Jack Hawkins
items.plot: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

items.title: Apocalypse Now
items.actors: Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando, Robert Duvall
items.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

items.title: What We Do in the Shadows
items.actors: Jemaine Clement, Taika Waititi, Cori Gonzalez-Macuer
items.plot: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are struggling with the mundane aspects of modern life, like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs, and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

items.title: What We Did on Our Holiday
items.actors: Rosamund Pike, David Tennant, Billy Connolly
items.plot: A family of five heads to Granddad's big 75th-birthday party at an uncle's estate in rural Scotland. The parents are separated and hope their three kids won't mention it. The kids love, can talk with, and would do anything for Gra...

items.title: Parasite
items.actors: Song Kang-ho, Lee Sun-kyun, Cho Yeo-jeong
items.plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

items.title: Green Book
items.actors: Viggo Mortensen, Mahershala Ali, Linda Cardellini
items.plot: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver for an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

items.title: Onward
items.actors: Tom Holland, Chris Pratt, Julia Louis-Dreyfus
items.plot: Two elven brothers embark on a quest to bring their father back for one day.

items.title: Spies in Disguise
items.actors: Rachel Brosnahan, Jarrett Bruno, Claire Crosby
items.plot: When the world's best spy is turned into a pigeon, he must rely on his nerdy tech officer to save the world.

items.title: The Apartment
items.actors: Romane Bohringer, Vincent Cassel, Jean-Philippe Écoffey
items.plot: A recently engaged man sees a former lover and becomes obsessed with meeting her again.

items.title: Extreme Job
items.actors: Seung-ryong Ryu, Lee Hanee, Jin Seon-kyu
items.plot: A police undercover operation takes a delicious, unexpected turn.

items.title: Cruella
items.actors: Emma Stone, Emma Thompson, Joel Fry
items.plot: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil.

items.title: In Bruges
items.actors: Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson, Ciarán Hinds
items.plot: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

items.title: The Mauritanian
items.actors: Tahar Rahim, Nouhe Hamady Bari, Saadna Hamoud
items.plot: Mohamedou Ould Slahi fights for freedom after being detained and imprisoned without charge by the U.S. Government for years.

items.title: Knives Out
items.actors: Daniel Craig, Chris Evans, Ana de Armas
items.plot: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

items.title: Squid Game
items.actors: Lee Jung-jae, Park Hae-soo, Hoyeon
items.plot: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes. A survival game that has a whopping 45.6 billion-won prize at stake.

items.title: I'm Your Man
items.actors: Maren Eggert, Dan Stevens, Sandra Hüller
items.plot: In order to obtain research funds for her studies, a scientist accepts an offer to participate in an extraordinary experiment: for three weeks, she is to live with a humanoid robot, created to make her happy.

items.title: Boss Level
items.actors: Frank Grillo, Mel Gibson, Naomi Watts
items.plot: Trapped in a time loop that constantly repeats the day of his murder, a former special forces agent must unlock the mystery behind his untimely demise.

items.title: What About Bob?
items.actors: Bill Murray, Richard Dreyfuss, Julie Hagerty
items.plot: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

items.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
items.actors: George Clooney, Meryl Streep, Bill Murray
items.plot: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

items.title: The Lost City
items.actors: Sandra Bullock, Channing Tatum, Daniel Radcliffe
items.plot: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour with her cover model gets swept up in a kidnapping attempt that lands them both in a cutthroat jungle adventure.

items.title: Hoodwinked
items.director: Cory Edwards, Todd Edwards, Tony Leech
items.actors: Anne Hathaway, Glenn Close, Patrick Warburton
items.plot: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman, and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.

items.title: The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
items.actors: Greg Stebner, Woody Allen, John Tormey
items.plot: An insurance investigator and an efficency expert who hate each other are both hypnotized by a crooked hypnotist with a jade scorpion into stealing jewels.

items.title: The Act of Killing
items.actors: Anwar Congo, Herman Koto, Syamsul Arifin
items.plot: A documentary which challenges former Indonesian death-squad leaders to reenact their mass-killings in whichever cinematic genres they wish, including classic Hollywood crime scenarios and lavish musical numbers.

items.title: Don't Look Up
items.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jennifer Lawrence, Meryl Streep
items.plot: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn humankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

items.title: The French Dispatch
items.actors: Benicio Del Toro, Adrien Brody, Tilda Swinton
items.plot: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".

items.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
items.actors: Michelle Yeoh, Stephanie Hsu, Jamie Lee Curtis
items.plot: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.

items.title: Barney's Version
items.actors: Paul Giamatti, Rosamund Pike, Jake Hoffman
items.plot: The picaresque and touching story of the politically incorrect, fully lived life of the impulsive, irascible and fearlessly blunt Barney Panofsky.

items.title: Sing 2
items.actors: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Scarlett Johansson
items.plot: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

items.title: The Shining
items.actors: Jack Nicholson, Shelley Duvall, Danny Lloyd
items.plot: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

items.title: Ready Player One
items.actors: Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn
items.plot: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

items.title: Bullet Train
items.actors: Brad Pitt, Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson
items.plot: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.

items.title: Big Fish
items.actors: Ewan McGregor, Albert Finney, Billy Crudup
items.plot: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

items.title: Little Miss Sunshine
items.actors: Steve Carell, Toni Collette, Greg Kinnear
items.plot: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

items.title: Midnight in Paris
items.actors: Owen Wilson, Rachel McAdams, Kathy Bates
items.plot: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

items.title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
items.actors: Tilda Swinton, Idris Elba, Erdil Yasaroglu
items.plot: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

items.title: Palm Springs
items.actors: Andy Samberg, Cristin Milioti, J.K. Simmons
items.plot: Stuck in a time loop, two wedding guests develop a budding romance while living the same day over and over again.

items.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
items.actors: Ben Stiller, Kristen Wiig, Jon Daly
items.plot: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he ever imagined.

items.title: A Street Cat Named Bob
items.actors: Luke Treadaway, Bob the Cat, Ruta Gedmintas
items.plot: The true feel-good story of how James Bowen, a busker and recovering drug addict, has his life transformed when he meets a stray ginger cat. Based on the international best selling book.

items.title: Licorice Pizza
items.actors: Alana Haim, Cooper Hoffman, Sean Penn
items.plot: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

items.title: Inside Job
items.actors: Lizzy Caplan, Christian Slater, Clark Duke
items.plot: For employees of the Deep State, conspiracies aren't just theories, they're fact. And keeping them a secret is a full-time job.

items.title: 100 Meters
items.actors: Dani Rovira, Karra Elejalde, Alexandra Jiménez
items.plot: Based on true events, a Spanish man with multiple sclerosis who tried to finish an Iron-Man competition despite he was told that he could not make 100 meters.

items.title: Love Me If You Dare
items.actors: Guillaume Canet, Marion Cotillard, Thibault Verhaeghe
items.plot: As adults, best friends Julien and Sophie continue the odd game they started as children -- a fearless competition to outdo one another with daring and outrageous stunts. While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, the...
